actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to further restrict the use of the congressional franking privilege during periods preceding elections.

summary.text: Prohibits mass mailings by members of Congress less than 60 days before any primary or general election in which such member is a candidate.

titles.title: A bill to further restrict the use of the congressional franking privilege during periods preceding elections.
